game.name: THE CANON OF BALLS
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hardcore, first-person, co-op platformer. Shadow of the Colossus' PSX aesthetics meets Monkey Ball. An easy-to-learn, hard-to-master open-world experience to explore and master together with your friends. A vast open world, with each platforming course bringing its own twist.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hardcore, first-person, co-op platformer. Shadow of the Colossus' PSX aesthetics meets Monkey Ball. An easy-to-learn, hard-to-master open-world experience to explore and master together with your friends. A vast open world, with each platforming course bringing its own twist.
